Class JDAContext

java.lang.Object
com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.JDAContext
public final class JDAContext extends Object

Wrapper class for JDA and ShardManager. Use

invalid reference 
#performTask(Consumer)
when you need to do work with an JDA object.

  • Method Details

    • performTask

      public void performTask(Consumer<JDA> consumer, boolean onlyFirstShard)
      Performs an operation on either the JDA object or on all shards.
      Parameters:
      consumer - the operation to perform
      onlyFirstShard - whether this task should only be executed on the first shard if a ShardManager is used

    • getGuildCache

      public SnowflakeCacheView<Guild> getGuildCache()
      SnowflakeCacheView of all cached Guilds.
      Returns:
      the SnowflakeCacheView
